verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:1
verses.text: Now Hiram king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and timber of cedars, with masons and carpenters, to build him an house.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:2
verses.text: And David perceived that the Lord had confirmed him king over Israel, for his kingdom was lifted up on high, because of his people Israel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:3
verses.text: And David took more wives at Jerusalem: and David begat more sons and daughters.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:4
verses.text: Now these are the names of his children which he had in Jerusalem; Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:5
verses.text: And Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpalet,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:6
verses.text: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 14:7
verses.text: And Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphalet.
